Title: Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Jonathan Demme
Director.Bio: Robert Jonathan Demme was an American director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: A genre that focuses on serious presentations or stories with settings or life situations that portray realistic characters in conflict with either themselves, others, or forces of nature.

Director.Name: Frank Darabont
Director.Bio: Frank Darabont is a Hungarian-American film director, screenwriter, and producer who has been nominated for three Academy Awards and a Golden Globe.

Title: The Godfather
Description: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Genre.Name: Crime
Genre.Description: A genre that focuses on criminal activities or the criminal lifestyle.

Director.Name: Francis Ford Coppola
Director.Bio: Francis Ford Coppola is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter who was a central figure in the New Hollywood filmmaking movement of the 1960s and 1970s.

Title: Inception
Description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets from their subconscious.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: A genre that explores imaginative concepts that are largely based on speculative scientific discoveries, phenomena, or events.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Christopher Nolan, the visionary British-American filmmaker, is celebrated for his unique cinematic style and groundbreaking storytelling techniques that have redefined modern cinema.
